name: snarl
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user yells as if it’s ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stat of opposing Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user yells as if it’s ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stat of opposing Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user yells as if it’s ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stat of opposing Pokémon.
